content: knit this stylish and modern beanie featuring a warm and secure double brim and delicate striping the horizons beanie uses chainette yarn a beautifully soft and luxurious baby alpaca wool blend that feels amazing against the skin these beanies are unisex and a great way for moms and dads to twin with their little ones the horizons beanie will be your new favourite beanie with its modern appeal slight slouch and warm and cozy feel if you ve always been wanting to learn how to knit a **double brim** check out my detailed step-by-step tutorial and accompanying video in my blog post note that the pdf includes **both** the adult horizons beanie and child horizons beanie as well as the double brim tutorial
